title: Bug 120315: Display property set to none not taking effect in new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to "none" in the new PDF emitter, the label associated with the item remains visible.
EB: The label should disappear when the display property of an item is set to "none" in the new PDF emitter.
SR:
1. Open the new PDF emitter.
2. Set the display property of an item to "none".
3. Preview the PDF.
4. Observe that the label associated with the item is still visible.
